data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Pathum Thani.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pathum Thani, Thailand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4,966 believers in Pathum Thani that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Pathum Thani, Thailand.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Pathum Thani.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Iu Mien people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Iu Mien people.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Pathum Thani who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
the state of Pathum Thani has (about) 4,966 people who know Jesus, 5,069 people who know about him culturally, and 757,965 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, teach the 4,966 believers in the state of Pathum Thani the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
